de.uka.ipd.sdq.beagle.core

Class UserConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uka.ipd.sdq.beagle.core.UserConfiguration

  • public class UserConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all settings done by the user. This object starts out with default values set to it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ADAPTIVE_TIMEOUT
      Numeric value for "adaptive timeout".
      static int DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
      The default setting for the timeout.
      static int NO_TIMEOUT
      Numeric value for "no timeout".

      Constructs a new UserConfiguration using elements as the default elements to be measured.
